scripts.js-build: browserify src/ -o dist/bundle.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -t brfs -t read-directory/transform
scripts.js-watch: watchify src/ -o dist/bundle.js -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -t brfs -t read-directory/transform
scripts.css-build: node src/design/ | postcss --use autoprefixer --use postcss-clean > dist/bundle.css
scripts.build: npm run js-build & npm run css-build
